cast.name: 蔡斯·克劳福德 Chace Crawford

introduction: Best Friends since childhood, Jack, Steve and Larry found St. Louis an unlikely spot for the Pope's annual pilgrimage. Raised on the streets the three boiys survived the harsh winters and harsher summers cheering their beloved Rams, Blus and Cards...they also dealt drugs. Jack's girlfriend now pregnant vows enough is enough and would not accept a drug dealer as father to her child... and Steve the ringleader has something very important to share with his lifetime cohorts...on this very special day...their lifes are about to change...forever.
